org.junit.internal.requests.ClassRequest contains logic which selects
the a=
ppropriate Runner for use with a given test class.  This logic
includes pic=
king the OldTestClassRunner for junit3 tests.  

This is great, since I hav=
e a large number of legacy junit3 tests
mixed in with some junit4 tests, an=
d I can just pass them all to
JunitCore and they work.

However, in a few c=
ases, I have junit 3 tests with a static suite()
method.  Junit4 can handle=
 this using the AllTests runner, but
unfortunately the code in ClassRequest=
 ddoes not make use of AllTests
which decided which runner to use.

Could C=
lassRequest be altered to detect if AllTests should be used,
rather just ha=
nding the test straight to OldTestClassRunner?
